attributes.action: reinstate funding for Territorial Army training
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the TA serves in the front line and have lost lives in both Iraq and Afghanistan. There training budget should not be slashed so they can no longer train.If money is needed to be saved then cut back on desk jockeys and pen pushers. The TA budget must be reinstated now or the TA will lose even more members and will no longer be a viable force.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
